io.spine.server.event.model

Interface EventReceiverClass

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReactingClass
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggregateClass, AggregatePartClass, CommanderClass, EventSubscriberClass, ProcessManagerClass, ProjectionClass, ReactorClassDelegate

    public interface EventReceiverClass
    Describes a class of objects that receive events.

    A class can declare methods to receive events from the same Bounded Context (“domestic” events), or events originated in another Bounded Context (“external” events).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<io.spine.core.EventClass> getEventClasses()
      Obtains a set of event classes which this class receives.
      java.util.Set<io.spine.core.EventClass> getExternalEventClasses()
      Obtains a set of external events which this class receives.

    • Method Detail

      • getEventClasses

        java.util.Set<io.spine.core.EventClass> getEventClasses()
        Obtains a set of event classes which this class receives.

        The returned set contains only event classes of the BoundedContext to which the class belongs.

        For external events, please see getExternalEventClasses().

      • getExternalEventClasses

        java.util.Set<io.spine.core.EventClass> getExternalEventClasses()
        Obtains a set of external events which this class receives.

        External events are those that are delivered to the BoundedContext to which this class belongs from outside.

        For domestic events, please see getEventClasses().
